text: @Ronak_996 @anuja_gawshinde @ShefVaidya What i said is, "differences ki respect honi chahiye". Mujhe Blue pasand hai, aapko Red! Main galat nahin hoon, bas aapse alag hoon. Mere blue ki bhi respect honi chahiye aapke red k saath. Aur respect sabki equal nahi ho sakti mere bhaai, we don't live in a Utopian Society.
